name: Heather Shaffer
text: Great gluten-free pizza! It’s even good the next day, which is often not the case. Most gluten-free food is almost inedible the next day, and this pizza was even good cold! Price was comparable to other gluten-free offerings from other …More

name: felicia durnez
text: Bread sticks were very hard too eat and peppery i would not recommend this place sorry

text:
In my opinion, best pizza and wings in the Sault!
Always fresh, fast, and accurate.

name: Bruce Barthel
text:
I've had the subs and pizzas and they're classic Howie's every time. I wasn't expecting their SALADS to be SO GOOD.
Seriously...Try a salad

name: Nikki Merrick
text: Pizza was cold when we had it delivered but the best part was when we opened the box the cheese was all stuck to the top and the pizza smashed. We also ordered a 2liter so by the look of the lid looks like they laid the 2 liter on top. The …More

name: Andrew West
text: Excellent pizza place! Never had pizza from this pizza chain before, but really enjoyed it. Great lunch specials! The Howie rolls are highly recommend also. Customer service was very good. Can't wait to go there again.

text: Got wings and a pizza deluxe sub. I was not disappointed one bit!

name: Drew Bramham
text: I was surprised at how good Hungry Howie's was.  I had a little pizza, and it was great.  Probably about a billion calories, but great.  The subs are essentially pizzas folded in half like a panzoratti and also great.  The chicken bacon …More

text: Good pizza with flavored crust. watch for their specials to save yourself some money. Parking can be a bit busy at times but you can also park on the street or have it delivered.

text: Love their salads! A single salad is huge and the price is great!.  They also have gluten free pizza but if you're like me the cross contamination is real.

name: Alicia Henderson
text: The best pizza place in town. Fresh dough that isn't delivered in frozen proportioned amounts like all the other pizza places, not extremely greasy and they have THE BEST calzones ever!  Great prices especially for the quality. I'd rather pay a couple more dollars for a pizza from Howie's than eat Little Caesars. <3
